name: Integrate Real-Time Flight API
description: Connect and configure real-time flight data API to fetch schedules, pricing, and availability for customer bookings

name: Launch Monsoon Travel Campaign
description: Design creatives, finalize destinations, and run social media ads for special monsoon tour packages

name: Create Hotel Partner Onboarding Form
description: Build a form and backend logic to onboard new hotel partners with property details and pricing

name: Audit All Tour Inquiry Sheets
description: Go through Unity, Daman, and FlyAnyTrip enquiry sheets to identify high-conversion leads and assign agents

name: Build Subscription Validation System
description: Implement backend logic to block agents with expired subscriptions and allow renewal via dashboard

name: Design International Tour Brochure
description: Collaborate with design team to create downloadable brochures for Bali, Dubai, and Europe packages

name: Setup Lead Auto-Routing Logic
description: Implement system to auto-assign inquiries to regional agents based on location and availability

name: Add Razorpay to Booking Flow
description: Integrate Razorpay checkout and webhooks to confirm bookings and update payment status

name: Host Agent Training Session
description: Schedule a Zoom session for all agents to understand new CRM features and inquiry management process

name: Optimize Google Business Profile
description: Update business hours, add latest reviews, and upload recent images for better local SEO rankings
